name: Wand Solar
headline: We enable landlords to generate income from solar panels.
description: Wand Solar enables Solar Revenue for Income Properties owners. By empowering landlords to sell solar energy directly to tenants, we make it a no-brainer for landlords to adopt solar energy.

founders.name: Idan Shahar, Founder
founders.description:
I always operate at the forefront of technology, curious about Kubernetes, App Innovations, Cloud Native, and OSS technologies.
I enjoy partnering with developers and C-level executives to realize the value of Cloud Native through, public speaking, communities, and hackathons.
I've been a backend developer most of my life, and in the last few years, I helped companies build and modernize Cloud Native applications.

founders.name: Itai Peri, Founder
founders.description:
I'm super passionate about entrepreneurship, and have been in this area for the past 6 years.
I come from a background of Software Engineering and Machine Learning, and love to solve complex problems using these two disciplines.
In the past I've been CTO of a B2C startup, and as a Data Scientist in another startup led a project for identifying diseases in trees using advanced Computer Vision algorithms.
Nowadays I'm working to help companies better manage their delivery pipelines.

## Maximize your rental income
Embark on your solar success journey with us by your side.
[![A business women celebrate success](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64cfc72dab6afe5269f5e2f8/64d224624aec33834c8aaa05_business%20women%201.webp)Effortless Solar BillingWe generate a single, clear bill for your tenants - taking into account both energy sourced from the electricity provider and your solar panels. ](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)[![A business man counts money](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64cfc72dab6afe5269f5e2f8/64d23a1251d5b7f7e4ae1c3a_income.webp)Smart Payment DistributionWe transparently split the bill between you and the electricity provider. Each receives payment for the electricity provided by them.](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)[![Wife and husband holding their new house key](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64cfc72dab6afe5269f5e2f8/64d22a790ecba5700a7773e7_holding%20home%20key.webp)**A Win-Win Solution** We ensure maximum return on your solar investment, while keeping tenants happy with climate-friendly energy and fair pricing.](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
How it works
## Get started as easy as 1, 2, 3
Our software platform streamlines solar billing and payment distribution, enabling rental owners to smoothly earn from their solar investment.
![A house with solar panels](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64cfc72dab6afe5269f5e2f8/64d21e2599a7a3773aa7ab56_home%20solar.gif)
### Connect Your Property for Free
Our platform collects your tenants' energy consumption. No additional hardware is required.
![Energy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64cfc72dab6afe5269f5e2f8/64d211109981e155b3b31563_energy.gif)
### Wand Handles Billing
We calculate your tenants' energy bills based on the electricity rates, ensuring transparency and fairness.
![Shake hands](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64cfc72dab6afe5269f5e2f8/64d2135f0481cf93b4c87573_deal.gif)
### Enjoy Solar Income
We take care of the financial transactions smoothly. Tenants are charged accurately, and we ensure payments are made to you.
Why us
## A dedicated solution for rental property owners
[Schedule a call](https://www.wandsolar.com/</schedule-a-call>)
[Sign up](https://www.wandsolar.com/<https:/app.wandsolar.com/signup>)

## What our landlords say
Discover the firsthand experiences of landlords who have partnered with Wand Solar to unlock new opportunities and maximize their rental income.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64cfc72dab6afe5269f5e2f8/66e2da366f4d40ef62361100_chris.png)
### ‚ÄúIncreased Cap Rate with Solar Energy‚Äù
Wand Solar has revolutionized the management of my rental properties. Their platform allows me to easily monetize solar energy, adding value for my tenants while significantly boosting my revenue. This approach has effectively increased my properties‚Äô cap rate, providing a clear boost to my investment returns.
Chris J.‍Marin, CA
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64cfc72dab6afe5269f5e2f8/66e2d5d44b7401da4a5886b6_Vivian.png)
### ‚ÄúIncreased My Monthly Income by $110‚Äù
Thanks to Wand Solar, my rental property is not just sustainable but more profitable. The solar billing system has increased my monthly income by an average of $110 while making a positive impact on the environment. It‚Äôs a win-win solution that enhances both my revenue and my contribution to reduce carbon emissions.
Vivian N. San Diego, CA
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64cfc72dab6afe5269f5e2f8/66e2d782dd2bd6955d0d1f42_James.png)
### ‚ÄúSolar Panels Made It Easy to Find Tenants‚Äù
Choosing Wand Solar was one of the best decisions I made for my rental properties. By offering a 10% discount on energy costs, I was able to quickly attract eco-conscious tenants. The addition of solar not only improved the sustainability of my properties but also made them stand out in a competitive rental market, making it much easier to fill vacancies
James B.Austin, TX

![Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64cfc72dab6afe5269f5e2f8/65d37d3ae34fd87ad7731f6c_right-arrow-line-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)
## Frequently Asked Questions
Got questions? We've got answers!
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### Why choose Wand Solar?
Wand Solar empowers landlords to monetize their solar investments. With our innovative platform, you can generate income from the solar energy produced on your properties while ensuring a seamless billing process for your tenants. 
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### Do I need additional hardware for Wand Solar to work?
No, Wand Solar does not require any additional hardware. As long as you have solar panels installed on your property, you can take advantage of our solution to bill tenants for the solar energy they consume. 
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### How can I increase my rental property income?
By utilizing Wand Solar, you can charge your tenants for the solar energy they use, just like a utility would. This means you can earn revenue from the solar energy your panels generate while maintaining fair and transparent billing practices. 
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### How much does Wand Solar charge for its services?
Wand Solar charges 10% of the bill charged to tenants for the solar energy they use. This fee allows you to generate income from your solar panels while keeping the pricing straightforward and transparent.
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### What sets Wand Solar apart from other solutions?
Unlike traditional methods such as flat fees or higher rent prices, Wand Solar offers a groundbreaking solution that bills tenants in a manner similar to utilities. This encourages energy efficiency, ensures fair billing, and enhances your income from solar energy.
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### How do I get started with Wand Solar?
Getting started with Wand Solar is easy. Simply reach out to our team, and we'll guide you through the setup process. We'll help you maximize your solar investment while providing a win-win solution for both you and your tenants.
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### Can Wand Solar help me install solar panels?
While Wand Solar primarily focuses on optimizing income from existing solar panels, we also offer a financing solution for landlords interested in installing solar panels on their rental properties.
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### What's the key benefit of using Wand Solar?
The primary benefit of Wand Solar is that it enables landlords to generate income from solar panels installed on their properties, all while maintaining a positive tenant-landlord relationship and promoting eco-conscious energy usage.
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### How can I get in touch with Wand Solar for more information?
You can reach us via email at info@wandsolar.com or schedule a call with our team by visiting this link. We're here to assist you and provide more details about Wand Solar.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64cfc72dab6afe5269f5e2f8/65ce0d64217a2edaed8e363b_LOGOWAND%20DARK.webp)](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
Unlocking the solar potential for rental properties.
Join a Thriving Community of Rental Owners!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64cfc72dab6afe5269f5e2f8/64cfc72fab6afe5269f5e42f_Frame%201.webp)

## Frequently Asked Questions

### Why choose Wand Solar?
Wand Solar empowers landlords to monetize their solar investments. With our innovative platform, you can generate income from the solar energy produced on your properties while ensuring a seamless billing process for your tenants. 
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### Do I need additional hardware for Wand Solar to work?
No, Wand Solar does not require any additional hardware. As long as you have solar panels installed on your property, you can take advantage of our solution to bill tenants for the solar energy they consume. 
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### How can I increase my rental property income?
By utilizing Wand Solar, you can charge your tenants for the solar energy they use, just like a utility would. This means you can earn revenue from the solar energy your panels generate while maintaining fair and transparent billing practices. 
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### How much does Wand Solar charge for its services?
Wand Solar charges 10% of the bill charged to tenants for the solar energy they use. This fee allows you to generate income from your solar panels while keeping the pricing straightforward and transparent.
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### What sets Wand Solar apart from other solutions?
Unlike traditional methods such as flat fees or higher rent prices, Wand Solar offers a groundbreaking solution that bills tenants in a manner similar to utilities. This encourages energy efficiency, ensures fair billing, and enhances your income from solar energy.
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### How do I get started with Wand Solar?
Getting started with Wand Solar is easy. Simply reach out to our team, and we'll guide you through the setup process. We'll help you maximize your solar investment while providing a win-win solution for both you and your tenants.
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### Can Wand Solar help me install solar panels?
While Wand Solar primarily focuses on optimizing income from existing solar panels, we also offer a financing solution for landlords interested in installing solar panels on their rental properties.
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### What's the key benefit of using Wand Solar?
The primary benefit of Wand Solar is that it enables landlords to generate income from solar panels installed on their properties, all while maintaining a positive tenant-landlord relationship and promoting eco-conscious energy usage.
[](https://www.wandsolar.com/<#>)
### How can I get in touch with Wand Solar for more information?
You can reach us via email at info@wandsolar.com or schedule a call with our team by visiting this link. We're here to assist you and provide more details about Wand Solar.

generated_description:
### Wand Solar: Empowering Landlords through Solar Energy

**Founded**: 2023  
**Location**: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel  
**Team**: 2 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch**: S22  
**Website**: [wandsolar.com](https://www.wandsolar.com)

Wand Solar is on a mission to help landlords monetize their solar investments by allowing them to sell solar energy directly to their tenants. The idea here is simple but powerful: by streamlining the solar billing process, Wand Solar transforms what can often be a complicated venture into a straightforward, income-generating opportunity for real estate property owners.

#### The Concept

At its core, Wand Solar offers a platform that enables landlords of single-family and multi-family properties to easily integrate solar energy into their rental offerings. This approach not only adds a new revenue stream but also cultivates a more eco-conscious environment for tenants. By leveraging existing solar installations (or facilitating new ones), Wand Solar ensures that landlords can earn from the energy produced while keeping their tenants happy with potentially lower energy bills.

In a world where climate tech is becoming increasingly vital, Wand Solar positions itself within the broader context of real estate sustainability. The tagging of the company across categories like "solar-power," "real-estate," and "climate" reinforces its commitment to innovation in the renewable energy space.

#### How It Works

1. **Connection**: Landlords can connect their properties to the Wand Solar system without needing extra hardware. The platform smartly tracks tenant energy consumption to help landlords accurately bill them for solar energy used.
   
2. **Billing**: Wand Solar manages billing by generating a single, clear invoice that encompasses both energy sourced from the electricity provider and the solar panels installed.

3. **Earnings**: This billing structure ensures that landlords can enjoy a consistent income from their solar investments while promoting fair practices‚Äîevery tenant pays only for what they use.

By charging just a 10% fee on the bill charged to tenants for their solar energy use, Wand Solar maintains transparency while still incentivizing landlords to embrace the solar option.

#### Impacting the Community

Beyond the financial benefits, Wand Solar aims to create a community of rental owners who are invested in advancing solar energy adoption. They‚Äôve particularly stood by the Californian solar industry amid recent policy changes, showcasing their commitment to supporting the broader solar landscape.

Testimonials from landlords reveal real impacts: increased cap rates, monthly income boosts, and attracting eco-conscious tenants. It‚Äôs a win-win scenario‚Äîmore income for landlords and a step toward reducing carbon footprints for tenants.

If you‚Äôre a landlord looking to blend your rental business with innovative climate tech, Wand Solar is your partner in solar success. You can explore this opportunity further by visiting their website or scheduling a call for personalized guidance.

### Summary

Wand Solar is not just about solar panels; it‚Äôs about transforming properties into sustainable income sources. With straightforward billing and support for landlords, they statistically make the adoption of solar energy a no-brainer. Whether you're already equipped with solar panels or looking to install them, Wand Solar is ready to guide you toward maximizing your investment in a greener future.
